meanings.definition: Subject to a payment arrangement in which a fixed amount is paid per person for a specific period of time.
meanings.sent1: The capitated plan ensured each individual received a set payment.
meanings.sent2: The healthcare provider accepted capitated payments for their services.
meanings.sent3: The capitated agreement made budgeting easier for the organization.
meanings.sent4: Being capitated meant knowing the exact amount to expect each month.
meanings.sent5: The capitated model simplified the financial process for everyone involved.

meanings.definition: To arrange a payment system in which a fixed amount is paid per person for a specific period of time.
meanings.sent1: The insurance company capitated the payment structure for the new policy.
meanings.sent2: They decided to capitated the fees for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: She capitated the budget to ensure equal distribution of funds.
meanings.sent4: The organization capitated the payment plan to streamline the process.
meanings.sent5: He capitated the expenses to control costs effectively.
